message: I understand you value the first-mover advantage, so I'm proposing a slightly better deal for me this time.  Let's close this out and both benefit.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Time is running out, and we're both losing out because of inflation. This is a very reasonable offer for both of us. Take it and let's be done.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a bigger share.
Let's be practical. This is a fair deal, especially with the time pressure. Accepting this benefits us both more than dragging it out.
